name: The Blues
description:
I know It's hard, but you can try many times. Do you have hope? Where is the exit? There are an exit? Find your exit.

This game I've created to Ludum Dare 31 (http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-31/?action=preview&uid=18693). In final competition the game was evaluate with 53% de Coolness and best feature was Mood.

It's a artgame!

Controls:
Just use the arrows (up,down,left,right) or WASD keys
Use ESC to finish the game
